topic.title: Recovering RabbitMQ After Outage or Node Restart

abstract.shortdesc: RabbitMQ is the message queue service that runs on each of your controller nodes and brokers communication between multiple services in your cloud environment. It is important for cloud operators to understand how different troubleshooting scenarios effect RabbitMQ so they can minimize downtime in their environments. We are going to discuss multiple failure scenarios, how it effects RabbitMQ, and how you can recover from them if there are issues.
